title: Start To Succeed marketing website (Home/About/Courses/Contact) with SEO + click-to-call/WhatsApp

requirements.summary: Implement a modern, light-themed, mobile-first responsive UI with white background, blue/red accents, clean typography, spacious layout, cards/icons, shadows, and hover animations site-wide.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages/sections render correctly from 320px mobile up through desktop widths without horizontal scrolling.
Primary and secondary CTAs have visible hover/focus states and consistent spacing.
Typography (headings, body, buttons) is consistent site-wide and readable with sufficient contrast in the light theme.

file_operations.description: Create global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens for light theme (white background, blue/red accents), typography scale, consistent spacing, soft shadows, and visible focus rings; ensure hover/transition utilities feel consistent across interactive elements.
Extend theme tokens (colors, shadows, radii) to match the Start To Succeed light theme and enable consistent card/CTA styling across pages.

Create a shared layout wrapper (container widths, section spacing, responsive padding) to keep all sections visually consistent; use shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Card, Button) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the main app composition that applies the SiteLayout and renders the required sections (Home/About/Courses/Contact) in a cohesive, responsive structure; ensure interactive elements have smooth hover animations and visible focus states.

requirements.summary: Build the Home view with hero (headline/subheadline + Call Now/WhatsApp Us/Enroll Now CTAs), Why Choose icon cards, Courses highlights, and a strong CTA banner linking to enrollment/contact intent.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero CTAs are visible above the fold on mobile and desktop and are accessible via keyboard navigation.
The “Why Choose” icon-card layout adapts from a single-column stack on mobile to multi-column on larger screens.
The CTA banner includes a clear message and at least one actionable button that routes/scrolls to the Contact/Enroll action.

file_operations.description: Implement the Home section: hero headline/subheadline with three CTA buttons, “Why Choose” icon-card grid, “Courses Offered” highlights, and a bottom CTA banner; use shadcn-ui components (Button/Card) for consistent CTA and card UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add small helper(s) to smoothly scroll to the Contact section when users click “Enroll Now”/CTA banner buttons (and to support internal section navigation).
Wire HomeSection into the main layout (including section id for in-page navigation) and ensure hero background image placement does not reduce text contrast/readability.

requirements.summary: Create an About Us view with Mission, Vision, and Teaching Methodology content blocks in a trust-focused, academic, premium tone.
acceptanceCriteria: About content is organized into clearly labeled subsections (Mission, Vision, Teaching Methodology) with scannable headings.
Layout remains readable and visually consistent with the Home page styling on all breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Implement About section with three clearly labeled content blocks (Mission, Vision, Teaching Methodology) using consistent headings, spacing, and card/layout styling; use shadcn-ui Card for content blocks where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire AboutSection into the main layout and ensure a single logical H1 exists for the primary view while About uses appropriate H2/H3 hierarchy.

requirements.summary: Create a Courses view that groups Board classes (6–12) and Competitive foundation (IIT-JEE & NEET), each with description and enrollment/contact CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Courses are grouped into the two requested categories and are visually distinct (headings + card grid/list).
Each course item has a working CTA that triggers a clear next step (scroll to contact, open WhatsApp, or open enroll modal/section).

file_operations.description: Implement Courses section with two grouped categories (Board classes 6–12; Competitive foundation IIT-JEE & NEET) using a responsive card grid/list; each card includes a short description and CTA(s) that scroll to Contact and/or open WhatsApp; use shadcn-ui Card/Button for consistent UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add utilities to generate the tel: link and WhatsApp deep link using the provided phone/WhatsApp number; reuse across hero, courses CTAs, and footer.
Wire CoursesSection into the main layout and ensure CTAs correctly trigger the intended next step (scroll to Contact or open WhatsApp).

requirements.summary: Create a Contact Us view showing exact business info, a client-side contact form with success/failure UI (no full reload), and a lazy-loaded Google Map embed.
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section displays the exact address text and phone/WhatsApp number as provided.
The map embed renders on desktop and mobile; it is loaded in a performance-friendly way (e.g., lazy loading).
Submitting the contact form shows a success/failure state and does not cause a full page reload.

file_operations.description: Implement Contact section displaying the exact address and phone/WhatsApp details, plus a contact form (name, phone, optional email, message) and a map embed area that is lazy-loaded; use shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Label/Button for accessible form controls. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a map embed component that defers loading the Google Maps iframe until needed (e.g., on interaction or when scrolled into view) and uses performance-friendly settings (including iframe lazy loading).

Create a reusable contact form component with validation (required: name, phone, message), inline/announced errors, and async submit state (loading/success/failure) without page reload; use shadcn-ui form primitives for consistent accessible UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a frontend hook that uses useActor() to call the backend capability submitContactForm(...) and returns a simple submit API plus status (loading/success/error) for the ContactForm.
Wire ContactSection into the main layout with a stable section id to support scroll-to-contact from CTAs and footer links.

requirements.summary: Add a site-wide footer with quick links to sections, contact details (address + phone), and social links (Facebook + Google My Business) using provided URLs.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer links navigate to the correct page/section targets.
Facebook and Google My Business links open in a new tab and use safe link attributes (e.g., rel="noreferrer").
Footer remains readable and well-spaced on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Implement a responsive footer with quick links (Home/About/Courses/Contact), exact contact details (address + phone), and social links using the provided Facebook and Google My Business URLs (open in new tab with safe rel attributes); use shadcn-ui Button/link styling as needed. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire SiteFooter site-wide so it appears on all views/sections and ensure footer anchors scroll to the correct section ids.

requirements.summary: Implement click-to-call and WhatsApp integrations, including a mobile sticky WhatsApp button, and ensure hero CTAs use them.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking any phone link triggers a tel: link with the provided number.
The sticky WhatsApp button appears on mobile viewports and does not overlap critical UI elements (e.g., form submit button).
WhatsApp actions open the correct WhatsApp deep link/chat to the provided number.

file_operations.description: Create a sticky WhatsApp button that is visible on mobile viewports and opens the WhatsApp chat deep link to the provided number; ensure it avoids overlapping key UI (especially Contact form submit) and remains keyboard accessible; use shadcn-ui Button for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the hero “Call Now” and “WhatsApp Us” buttons use the shared contactLinks helpers so they open the correct tel: and WhatsApp deep links; keep them keyboard accessible and above-the-fold on mobile.
Wire contact detail links (phone/WhatsApp) to use the shared contactLinks helpers and ensure tap targets are appropriately sized on mobile.
Mount StickyWhatsAppButton globally and confirm spacing/z-index doesn’t clash with footer or Contact form actions.

requirements.summary: Add SEO and accessibility improvements: semantic headings (single H1), per-view meta title/description + Open Graph basics, accessible labels and focus states, keyboard navigation, alt text, and lazy-loading of non-critical embeds.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page/primary route sets a unique document title and meta description aligned with “Start To Succeed” and the page’s content.
All interactive elements are reachable by keyboard and have visible focus styling.
Form fields have associated labels and errors are announced/visible.
Non-critical embeds (map) are lazy-loaded or deferred to reduce initial load cost.

file_operations.description: Add baseline SEO/meta tags (meta description placeholder, Open Graph basics) and ensure the document includes required icon links; keep defaults aligned to “Start To Succeed” and the marketing site purpose.
Add a small SEO utility to set document title, meta description, and Open Graph fields from the active primary view/section (Home/About/Courses/Contact).

Wire SEO updates so the active primary view/section sets a unique title/description (e.g., based on current hash/scroll target); ensure semantic heading hierarchy with a single H1 for the primary view.
Ensure accessible labels are associated with inputs, validation errors are visible and announced (e.g., aria-live for summary/status), and all fields/buttons are keyboard navigable.
Ensure any decorative/branding imagery includes appropriate alt handling (alt text for meaningful images; empty alt for purely decorative) and interactive elements have clear focus/hover styles.
Ensure the map embed remains deferred/lazy-loaded to reduce initial load cost and is usable on both mobile and desktop.

requirements.summary: Add branded static images (logo, hero background, favicon) under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into header/hero and favicon/app icon usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present in frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (not served via the backend).
Logo is used in the site header and as a favicon/app icon where supported.
Hero graphic renders crisply on desktop and mobile and does not harm text readability (sufficient contrast).

file_operations.description: Add the generated logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sts-logo.dim_512x512.png (transparent background).
Add the generated hero background illustration at frontend/public/assets/generated/sts-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png (light theme, ample whitespace).
Add the generated favicon/app icon at frontend/public/assets/generated/sts-favicon.dim_128x128.png (high contrast on light backgrounds).

Create a site header that displays the logo (use frontend/public/assets/generated/sts-logo.dim_512x512.png), includes navigation links to the required sections, and provides consistent CTA styling; use shadcn-ui Button for nav/CTAs where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Use frontend/public/assets/generated/sts-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png in the hero background/illustration area while preserving text contrast and responsiveness.
Wire favicon/app icon links to frontend/public/assets/generated/sts-favicon.dim_128x128.png (and include any additional icon link tags as appropriate for broad support).
Wire SiteHeader into the global layout so the logo is visible site-wide and navigation works consistently across breakpoints.
